author: seungjin-yang
body:
#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Backport of #30468 and #31818 for enabling GEM offline DQM during MWGR.

#30468 created GEM offline DQM modules and python configuration files but GEM offline DQM source sequence wasn't included in DQMOfflineCosmics sequence for the comics scenario. So #31818 solved it. 


@jshlee @watson-ij @szaleski
title: Add GEM offline DQM, backport to 11_1_X
